TEXT.TITLE: COMMODORE <CBU>, ATARI IN SETTLEMENT
TEXT.BODY: Commodore International Ltd said it settled and discontinued all pending litigation with Atari Corp. The company issued a statement which said the case had been settled on terms satisfactory to both sides. Company officials were not immediately available for comment. Reuter
